name: Extreme Expedition
description:
This tour takes you to the Jungle, Lake, Cenotes, Underground River, Caribbean Sea and Natural Lagoon. Includes Zip Lining, Canoeing, Cliff diving, visit a Mayan Village, Swimming in a Cenote (Natural Mineral Pool).
 
The tour takes you through (4) snorkeling systems. Snorkeling in the Jungle Cenotes, Underground River System & Bat Cave, Yal-ku Natural Aquarium Lagoon - with different kinds of Sea life.
 
Discover an entire new world! Enjoy a (4) four course lunch at World Famous “Oscar & Lalo Restaurant, Bar & Grill”, continental breakfast, snacks, drinks and air-conditioned transportation included.
